manifestTitle.description: This is the title of the extension.

manifestDescription.description: This is the description of the extension.

popupStatusHeading.descripton: This is the placeholder template for the status inside the popup.

popupStatusNotReady.description: This is the status text that appears in the popup when extension is not ready.
popupStatusNotReady.message: Waiting to detect a registered page.

popupStatusReady.description: This is the status text that appears in the popup when extension is ready.
popupStatusReady.message: Currently detecting a registered page; ready to start working.

popupStatusWorking.description: This is the status text that appears in the popup when extension is working.

popupTitleNotReady.description: This is the popup title that appears when extension is not ready.
popupTitleNotReady.message: This page is not registered as a GPT starting point.

popupTitleReady.description: This is the popup title that appears when extension is ready.
popupTitleReady.message: This page is registered as a GPT starting point.

popupTitleWorking.description: This is the popup title that appears when extension is working.
